name: Lost Dimension: All Costumes Bundle
detailed_description: A collection of special costumes for all characters including: Himeno’s “Sweet Teacher” costume, Toya’s “Dapper Socialite” costume, Mana’s “Rising Star” and “Dream Fighter” costumes, Nagi’s “Risqué Oiran” costume, Sojiro’s “Loveable Ursine” costume, Zenji’s “Bad Boy” costume, Marco’s “Kitty Costume” costume, Yoko’s “Shining Idol” costume, Agito’s “Freshman Prince” costume and George’s “Fallen Samurai” costume. Equip these via the Setup\Equipment menu from the Lobby.
